title: Citi Ventures Invests in Mobile Payment Technology Square
summary: Citi Ventures collaborates with internal and external partners on new ventures that have the potential to help Citi clients succeed, to generate new value for Citi and to transform the banking industry. We are proud to announce a strategic investment in Square, a payments innovator.
tag-1: Citi Ventures Invests in Mobile Payment Technology Square
tag-2: Citi Ventures collaborates with internal and external partners on new ventures that have the potential to help Citi clients succeed, to generate new value for Citi and to transform the banking industry. We are proud to announce a strategic investment in Square, a payments innovator.
tag-3: We have watched Square with interest as they've changed the payments landscape with products for businesses and consumers that are built on the twin principles of simplicity and transparency. With their landmark partnerships, Square is lifting the entire mobile payments ecosystem by helping drive consumer awareness and adoption, rapidly becoming a leader in the payments and mobile acceptance space, an area Citi has been focused on for several years.
tag-4: Making strategic investments in forward-looking companies like Square is one of the ways we're working to help define the future of money. We look forward to exploring opportunities to leverage the global footprint and local market expertise of Citi business units to work with the Square team as they continue to innovate and scale internationally.
